0.1.name: wordpress/selective-tweets
0.1.description: The plugin provides a widget, which shows a list of tweets from the specified author, filtered by a specified hashtag. User name and hashtag are customizable. The plugin uses AJAX to fetch status notices, hence it does'nt work for users without javascript enabled at the moment, but keeps the page load small.
